dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication New technologies and innovative uses of existing technologies are improving crisis preparedness response and prevention Yet barriers to bringing these ideas to scale remain and humanitarian aid groups and others must weigh the potential risks and rewards of using new communications technology tools Washington DC UN Foundation Vodafone Foundation Partnership December 2009
